channel.title: Jan Savinc's personal website
channel.description: Recent content on Jan Savinc's personal website

item.title: Bake-at-home animations: render individual frames with {gganimate} and animate later
item.description: I recently ran into an issue creating animated plots using {gganimate} in the National Safe Haven environment I use for research at SCADR, where the resulting files were either broken or could not be displayed, and I figured it was safer to produce images that definitely worked and use them to build an animation on a different computer. I think of this as bake-at-home animations (as in those partly-baked baguettes you’re meant to finish baking at home).
